newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Swire sells two Island Plc office floors.
newsitem.headline: Swire sells two Island Plc office floors.

text.p: Wah Tak Fung Holdings Ltd said on Friday it would sign a contract with Swire Properties Real Estate Agency Ltd on Monday for the purchase of two floors in Island Place Towers.
Island Place is a joint venture development between Swire Pacific Ltd and China Motor Bus Co Ltd in Hong Kong island's North Point district.
A source familiar with the deal said the consideration amounted to some HK$200 million.

Swire group spokeswoman Maizee Shun Wah confirmed Swire Properties Real Estate Agency was acting on behalf of the developer and said the two floors represented a total gross floor area of about 40,000 sq ft.
She declined to disclose the price but said similar units in Island Place had been priced between HK$5,000 and HK$5,500 per sq ft.
